https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qoILNllyC6YXHyT4V9YOhMJlPuO.jpg Based on the original animated series Ben 10. Ben becomes targeted by an evil Mechamorph Warrior, named "Retaliator," who mistakenly blames Ben for something he did not do and attempts to destroy all aliens. Ben 10: Destroy All Aliens
